hero.description: I'm an enthusiastic developer who loves solving problems with modern technology.

sinarmasLand.title: Outsystems Developer - Sinarmas Land
sinarmasLand.description: I developed web and mobile applications using the OutSystems low-code platform for various internal company projects. In my work, I implemented features based on user requirements and predetermined specifications. Additionally, I was involved in application maintenance, including investigating and fixing bugs in several ongoing projects.

malaTours.title: Search Engine Optimization - Mala Tours
malaTours.description: I developed content strategies for promotion and search engine optimization (SEO), successfully increasing organic search rankings by up to 80%. Additionally, I conducted keyword research and SEO optimization to ensure content was optimized to achieve higher search engine rankings.

ppkd.title: Web Programming
ppkd.description: Attended Web Programming training at PPKD Jakarta Pusat, learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel (MVC), RESTful API, MySQL, React.js, Tailwind, and jQuery. Focused on hands-on practice and project development. Graduated with BNSP competency certification as a web developer.

upnvj.title: Bachelor's - Computer Science, UPNVJ
upnvj.description: Active as a committee member in various faculty and university activities, such as events, competitions, and webinars, which honed organizational, teamwork, and communication skills. Served as a teaching assistant for Introduction to Databases (2020), responsible for guiding practicum sessions, helping with material understanding, and supporting exam preparation and assessment.

binar.title: Front End JavaScript - Binar Academy
binar.description: I focused on developing competencies in technology and digital through project-based learning methods, with emphasis on non-technical skills. I was also involved in real projects and learned to create dynamic websites using React.js.
